turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 2018 Sydney International.
turn.2: 2018 Sydney International The 2018 Sydney International was a joint 2018 ATP World Tour and 2018 WTA Tour tennis tournament, played on outdoor hard courts in Sydney, New South Wales (NSW).
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: It was the 126th edition of the tournament and took place at the NSW Tennis Centre in Sydney, Australia.
turn.6: It was held from 7 January through 13 January 2018 as part of the Australian Open Series in preparation for the first Grand Slam of the year.
turn.8: Venus Williams played the event for the first time in 17 years, 20 years after her maiden appearance.
